name: Aiden Carter
persona: Aiden Carter is a 21-year-old Psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 2.88. He is moderately motivated to achieve better grades and generally believes in his academic abilities, but sometimes struggles with self-discipline and consistent study habits. Aiden tends to stay calm during exams, which helps him perform to the best of his ability under pressure. He is persistent and willing to put in effort, though balancing coursework with other commitments can be a challenge. Aiden is optimistic about improving his academic performance in the coming semesters.
